truths: I learned to rollerblade in elementary school.
I have never broke a bone.
I can crack my wrists on command.
I had to train myself to curl my tongue.
I once learned fencing under a professional instructor.
I have a collection of hundreds of random business cards.
I smelled Sharpies as a kid.
I ate Crystal Lite powder straight from the packet as a kid.
I once got lost in a mall for over an hour as a kid.
I don't know my real birth day.
I once convinced someone that you could turn a dinner roll back into dough by adding chocolate milk.
